    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Expansion of solids and engineering</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Expansion der Körper und der Technik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expansion des solides et de l'ingénierie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Expansão dos sólidos e da engenharia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Espansione dei solidi e dell'ingegneria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επέκταση των στερεών και εφαρμοσμένη μηχανική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Extensión de sólidos y de la ingeniería</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that bridges are constructed in spans with gaps in between to provide allowance for expansion during hot weather.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">construction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">engineering</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">expansion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">material properties</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solids</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Brücken in den 
Überspannungen mit Abständen in-between konstruiert werden, um 
Genehmigung für Expansion bei heißem Wetter zur Verfügung zu 
stellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que des passerelles 
sont construites dans les envergures avec des lacunes dans 
l'intervalle pour fournir l'allocation pour l'expansion pendant le 
chaud survivent à.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que as pontes estão 
construídas nas extensões com aberturas dentro no meio para fornecer
a permissão para a expansão durante o tempo quente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che i ponticelli sono 
costruiti nel fratempo in portate con le lacune per fornire il 
permesso per espansione durante il tempo caldo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι οι γέφυρες 
κατασκευάζονται στις εκτάσεις με τα χάσματα για να παρέχουν 
ενδιάμεσα το επίδομα για την επέκταση κατά τη διάρκεια του 
καυτού καιρού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que los puentes están 
construidos en palmos con boquetes mientras tanto para proporcionar al
permiso para la extensión durante el tiempo caliente.</string>
          </description>
